name: Sinister Stools
description:
Sinister Stools is a fast-paced wave-based first person shooter. The game starts out slow but both the difficulty and the fun ramps up quickly. That being said, past wave 30 it starts to reduce again. Controls:

- WASD for movement

- Mouse to look around

- Left Click to shoot

- Spacebar to jump

- CTRL to crouch

- All other controls are shown in-game.

Features in this game: - In addition to the regular walk controls there is Jumping, Sliding, and Crouching - Random order wave system - Gun upgrade system(damage, range, fire rate, coolness) - Slowdown mechanic(starts from coolness level 5) - 4 Different enemy types - Challenging "Cool Slider" in options menu

This is the first game I've made in any engine, and due to that, there were many things I didn't add. Maybe someday I'll revisit the game and remaster it but until then I hope you enjoy!
